    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92787</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La roue des couleurs</string>
            <string language="en">The colour wheel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Farbe Rad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A roda da cor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La rotella di colore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ρόδα χρώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La rueda del color</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme avec légende montre pourquoi une  roue des couleurs semblera blanche quand elle est tournée rapidement.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram with labelling shows why a colour wheel will appear white when spun quickly.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mélange de couleurs</string>
            <string language="en">colour mixing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roue des couleurs</string>
            <string language="en">colour wheel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm mit dem Beschriften zeigt, warum 
ein Farbe Rad weiß aussieht, wenn es schnell gesponnen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama com etiquetar mostra porque uma 
roda da cor parecerá branca quando girada rapidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema con identificare mostra perchè una
rotella di colore sembrerà bianca una volta filata rapidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα με το μαρκάρισμα εμφανίζει γιατί 
μια ρόδα χρώματος θα εμφανιστεί άσπρη όταν περιστρέφεται 
γρήγορα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama con el etiquetado muestra porqué 
una rueda del color aparecerá blanca cuando está hecha girar 
rápidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe Mischen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe Rad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helles Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">misturar da cor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">roda da cor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spectrum claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">miscelazione di colore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rotella di colore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spettro chiaro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μίξη χρώματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρόδα χρώματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφρύ φάσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el mezclarse del color</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rueda del color</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espectro ligero</string>
          </keyword>
